abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with Dan Schneider, founder of SIB Development and Consulting, discussing his management technique.
snippet: Dan Schneider, founder of SIB Development and Consulting, says that instead of yelling at someone who’s made a big mistake, why not have him throw a party?
lead_paragraph: Dan Schneider, founder of SIB Development and Consulting, says that instead of yelling at someone who’s made a big mistake, why not have him throw a party?

headline.main: Made a Mistake? Just Treat Us to Ice Cream
headline.seo: Dan Schneider, Founder of SIB, on Handling Employee Errors
